Class SimpleListSyndicationExtensionContext

Encapsulates specific information about an individual SimpleListSyndicationExtension.

| Improve this Doc View Source

Grouping

Gets information that allows the client to group or filter on the values of feed properties.

Declaration
public Collection<SimpleListGroup> Grouping { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection<SimpleListGroup>

A System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection<T> collection of SimpleListGroup objects that represent information that allows the client to group or filter on the values of feed properties. The default value is an empty collection.
| Improve this Doc View Source

Gets information that allows the client to sort on the values of feed properties.

Declaration
public Collection<SimpleListSort> Sorting { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection<SimpleListSort>

A System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection<T> collection of SimpleListSort objects that represent information that allows the client to sort on the values of feed properties. The default value is an empty collection.
| Improve this Doc View Source

TreatAsList

Gets or sets a value indicating whether gets or sets a value indicating if this feed is intended to be consumed as a list.

Declaration
public bool TreatAsList { get; set; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.Boolean

true if the syndication feed is intended to be consumed as a list; otherwise false.
Remarks

This property allows the publisher of a feed document to indicate to the consumers of the feed that the feed is intended to be consumed as a list, and as such is the primary means for feed consumers to identify lists.

Load(XPathNavigator, XmlNamespaceManager)

Initializes the syndication extension context using the supplied System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.

Declaration
public bool Load(XPathNavigator source, XmlNamespaceManager manager)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator source

The XPathNavigator used to load this SimpleListSyndicationExtensionContext.
System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager manager

The System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager object used to resolve prefixed syndication extension elements and attributes.
Returns
Type Description
System.Boolean

true if the SimpleListSyndicationExtensionContext was able to be initialized using the supplied source; otherwise false.
Exceptions
Type Condition
System.ArgumentNullException

The source is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
System.ArgumentNullException

The manager is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

Writes the current context to the specified System.Xml.XmlWriter.

Declaration
public void WriteTo(XmlWriter writer, string xmlNamespace)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Xml.XmlWriter writer

The XmlWriter to which you want to write the current context.
System.String xmlNamespace

The XML namespace used to qualify prefixed syndication extension elements and attributes.
Exceptions
Type Condition
System.ArgumentNullException

The writer is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
System.ArgumentNullException

The xmlNamespace is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
System.ArgumentNullException

The xmlNamespace is an empty string.
